overview: A drama short film about two friends who regularly get to meet every weekend and they spend a Sunday chatting and how things take a turn from there.  Writer, Editor, Cinematographer & Director: Aman Saji Dominic Creative Director: Pratheesh Prakash  Sound Design: Yadu Krishna  Colour Grading: Aman Saji Dominic  Starring:  Anna Priya S Dominic, Sameera Nair, Aaradhya Arun Lakshman, Reshmi Padma, Sreyas Sarath. Soundtrack Courtesy:  Moving On,  Whitesand, Autumn - Loxbeats, Everlasting  Db Melody
title: Sunday
